title: Why cannot riot make Queen of Diamonds Syndra Skin better??

embed.description: League of Legends Queen of Diamonds Syndra Skin Spotlight. Sponsor: Lower your ping with WTFast, FREE TRIAL AVAILABLE! http://bit.ly/WTFastSpotlights Shows off Animations and Ability Effects of Syndra on their Queen of Diamonds Skin in this Spotlight. All footage was taken in game.

body: I really think it will not take much effort to change the balls' color or make some new animations to this skin. It will be sold very well if this has been done. Why dose riot insist on keeping this skin uncompleted and then just sell it out?

replies.body: Yea. I'm agreed that riot should  change {{champion:134}}  balls to color as red and white. RIot shouldn't create a skin just for new look. But they need to put better animation.

Hey riot?
Why didnt u make the orbs pink? Due to diamonds!

> [{quoted}](name=MastersYiAndMe,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=EAfN9tK0,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-13T00:10:43.561+0000)
>
> Hey riot?
> Why didnt u make the orbs pink? Due to diamonds!

Because diamonds are rarely pink?

> [{quoted}](name=MastersYiAndMe,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=EAfN9tK0,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-05-13T02:00:00.025+0000)
>
> Do look at Taric 'Gay' skin

Hmmm.. I thought Taric used Gem stones, not diamonds.

Gems, Gems are truly being replaced by diamonds... yea...

OKAY!
Instead of making the orbs PURPLE as usual, make it RED!
Why arent her orbs something else? Skin is garbage.
